alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Northern Valley; Sheridan (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 2:50PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Daniels, northeastern Valley and northern Sheridan Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 249 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms through Daniels and Sheridan counties moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plentywood, Scobey, Opheim, Richland, Flaxville, Archer, Port Of Raymond, Peerless, Port Of Whitetail, Madoc, Port Of Scobey, Redstone, Whitetail, Port Of Opheim, Outlook, Reserve, Raymond, Four Buttes, West Fork and Comertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
